dict.acceptation: 广告；网球中的优势分advantage. ad in；

sent.orig: The prevalence of AD was 6.06% and in VaD was 1.83%.
In this review,we discussed the relationship between NTFs and neurodegenerative diseases especially AD and PD.
sent.trans: 因此，本文主要讨论NTFs与神经元退行性变疾病特别是AD和PD之间的关系。

sent.orig: Caffeine intake was associated with a significantly lower risk for AD, independently of other confounding variables.
sent.trans: 咖啡因摄入量与AD风险降低明显相关，不依赖于其他伴随因子。

sent.orig: Two different methods for recycling ligand were tried in AD and AA reactions, respectively.
sent.trans: 并采用两种不同的方法进行AD和AA反应中配体的回收和重复使用。

sent.orig: Human apoE4 has been found in senile plaques (SPs) and neurofibrillary tangles (NTFs) in AD brains.
sent.trans: 研究进一步表明，AD患者脑内的老年斑和神经原纤维缠结中存在有较多的载脂蛋白E4(apolipoprotein E4,apoE4)。
